data.Name: Traptic
data.About: Building giant farming robots to save the world's food production system from a critical labor shortage
data.Tagline: Building giant farming robots to save the world's food production system from a critical labor shortage

data.Name: Square roots
data.About: A tech-enabled urban farming company empowering next-gen farmers to grow #hyperlocal, #realfood.
data.Tagline: A tech-enabled urban farming company growing local, real food and training next-gen leaders in urban agriculture.

data.Name: Plenty
data.About: Indoor vertical farmers on a mission to bring the freshest, cleanest, most craveable produce to people everywhere.
data.Tagline: Indoor vertical farmers on a mission to bring the freshest, cleanest, most craveable produce to people everywhere.

data.Name: Katif
data.About: Katif is a plug-and-play autonomous aeroponic vertical farming system.They partner with farmers from seed to sale to use less land, labor, power, water and consumables than conventional vertical farms.
data.Tagline: Autonomous, robotic and vertical farms for Cannabis and leafy greens

data.Name: Iron Ox
data.About: Iron Ox produces locally grown food from our autonomous, indoor farm that is good for people and for the planet, and affordable for everyone.
data.Tagline: Iron Ox develops robotic farms for better produce, everywhere.

data.Name: Growing Underground
data.About:
Agricultural revolution 100ft under London in disused WW2 Tunnels.
Sustainably feeding the city within the city. Powered 100% by renewable
energy
data.Tagline: Agricultural revolution 100ft under London in WW2 Air Raid Tunnels. Sustainably feeding the city from within the city

data.Name: Freight Farms
data.About: Freight Farms is the world’s leading manufacturer of container farming technology. They create access to food in areas of the world where the climate cannot support traditional farming methods and empower anyone to grow food for their community. The Freight Farms' system brings a high volume of fresh, quality and affordable food within reach of everyone along the food supply chain. By enabling high-yield crop production in any climate, Freight Farms offer an immediate foundation to grow a local food economy and sustainable food system.
data.Tagline: Freight Farms’ agricultural products and services enable on-site commercial food production anywhere in the world.

data.Name: Fifth Season Fresh
data.About:
Fifth Season is a robotic indoor vertical farming company using automation
and analytics to transform modern agriculture.

data.Name: Alesca Life
data.About:
We build indoor farming systems so our clients can enjoy safe, clean,
zero-mile food. HQ in Beijing
data.Tagline: Alesca Life builds indoor farms and farm management software to make food production more localized and data driven.

data.Name: Agricool
data.About: French company producing fruits and vegetables indoors using renewable energy and aeroponic systems.
data.Tagline: Agricool grows and produces fruits and vegetables inside shipping containers.

data.Name: Aerofarms
data.About: The world leader in indoor vertical farming since 2004. Proud

data.Name: 80 Acres Farms
data.About:
A vertical farm growing the cleanest (zero pesticides!), best tasting
produce. Truly local means shipping under 50 miles, farm to fork in 1 day!
data.Tagline: Creating a better world through growing food differently.
